column3: Tested ACK 891b0ee. Thanks for adding all the clarifications and `scriptpubkeyman_tests`.\n\nSo IIUC the reason we didn't see addresses added with `addmultisigaddress` in older wallets, is that `AddAndGetMultisigDestination` calls `AddAndGetDestinationForScript` which in turn called `AddCScript` on the multisig p2sh script, but _not the public keys and private keys_. Without those keys it's cons
Would be nice to rebase and cherry-pick Sjors@bacf559 into this
